Hey,

I've started taking care of this FirstPersonEVA mod and now I want to re-code it from ground up, having a better approach in mind. The thing is, I'm not really good with 3D modelling so I'd like to know whether or not anyone here has a IVA-view model for a Kerbal on EVA? Like, the view you'd get from inside of the EVA helmet.

Thanks in advance!

Best regards
